node.text:
Will the truth continue to be censored like the naked body often is? If the media doesn't tell the bare naked truth about the climate and ecological crisis, what do we stand to lose? Everything!⁣
⁣
Our life systems are at a breaking point. ⁣
⁣
Floods, fires and droughts are happening everywhere we look. ⁣
⁣
The government has failed to protect us and corporate greenwashing is rampant. ⁣
⁣
The radical change we need will only come once ordinary people take action. ⁣
⁣
We must find the means to enter the public discourse- where the truth and the extent of climate action required to avert climate catastrophe, biodiversity loss, and minimize the risk of social and ecological collapse can emerge.⁣
⁣
Treat this year like it’s Do or Die for the planet by standing with us.⁣
⁣
📌WHEN? September 17, 2021⁣
📍WHERE? New York City (specifics coming soon)⁣
✒️What Will You Do? Save the Date, Sign Up and Share! ⁣
👀See link in bio. ⁣
⁣
#NBCNews #NBCUniversal #TellTheTruth #DeclareCEENow #ClimateEmergency #ActNow #WeWantToLive #XRNYC #ExtinctionRebellion #ClimateDisaster #ClimateCrisis #ClimateEmergency #PeopleOverProfit #PlanetaryDestruction #ExtinctionRebellion #XRNYC #ExtinctionRebellionNYC #Protest #EndClimateSilence #FreeThePress ⁣
⁣
🎥 ⁣ @GeoffrayBarbier⁣
⁣
@nbcuniversal @nbc @nbcnews @nbcsports @telemundo @usa_network @msnbc @cnbc @todayshow alroker @ErinNMcGarry @DylanDreyerNBC @chrislhayes @BillKarins @JaniceHuff4ny @IndraPetersons @morningmika @joshjourno @extinctionrebellion @xrebellionUK 

Posted @withregram • @xr_nyc

node.text:
Today, Revd Tim Hewes, 71, has sewn his lips shut outside News Corp offices in London to draw attention to the silencing of climate science by Rupert Murdoch and News corp, which has led to a catastrophic lack of effective action to tackle the climate crisis.

Speaking ahead of the action, Tim said:

‘I’m sewing up my lips to demonstrate the terrible and violent havoc Murdoch’s actions have reaped upon the world and to symbolically make visible this truth. Today there are countless people throughout the world who are voiceless and suffering because of the climate emergency. Climate science and truth has been muted and those who suffer are not being heard. I have tried everything other way I can think of to end the influences and madness represented by Rupert Murdoch and his denial of the climate emergency.’

Please pray for Tim.

#TellTheTruth

node.text:
On the day a seismic survey of the Kavango Basin has been approved, Ina-Maria Shikongo appeals to the presidents of Canada and USA to act in line with their own fine words about environmental protection and climate mitigation, and stop Recon Africa's oil exploration of the Kavango Basin.

As the Okavango Delta is protected for its precious biodiversity and fragile ecosytem, supporting over a million people, the only way Recon Africa could have got the go-ahead for drilling, is through corruption.  This makes the Canadian government complicit in the criminal destruction of an irreplaceable  African ecosystem.  We need some basic honest actions to align with all the apparent 'green' words of this Canadian government, and stop Recon Africa and all other pointless fossil fuel projects going ahead.

This seismic information is used to predict potential areas where oil or gas may be trapped in sufficient quantities for further exploration activities such as drilling of an exploration well.

node.title: CALLING OUT THE PRESIDENTS OF CANADA AND USA

node.text:
—

Recent satellite images reveal the scale of deforestation occuring in Bugoma forest reserve as Hoima Sugar company expands its land use deep inside the forest, and others encroach from outside. 

When Hoima Sugar was given premission to log and plant sugar cane in Hoima forest Forest, in 2016, the National Forestry Authority of Uganda took the matter to the High Court.  Yet, despite this forest being home to some of the world's most endangered species, including chimpanzees, and despite each hectare of land being worth $28,000 in carbon sequestration alone, the National Forestry Authority of Uganda lost the court case to protect this land. 

The satellite images reveal just how fast the decline is happening and  that we need to stand behind the earth defenders on the frontline protecting this forest.  The National Forestry Authority wardens are often subjected to violence and it is hard for local people to publicly support the forest for fear of reprisals. 

Around the world we stand united and strong. You have to act now! #climatecrisisishere
@xr_uganda #passthemic #climatejustice #bugomaforest

node.title: SAVE BUGOMA FOREST | PASS THE MIC

node.text:
PAS D’HUILE DANS LES VIRUNGA 

Repost from @350africa 

C’est notre travail de nous défendre et de démanteler l’économie des combustibles fossiles, tenir responsables ceux qui profitent de la cupidité des entreprises, et construire un monde qui met en avant une planète habitable et l’intérêt public. Découvrez @350Africa en partageant les histoires de militants courageux et de dirigeants locaux qui refusent de garder le silence.

NO OIL IN VIRUNGA 

Repost from @350africa 

It’s our job to fight back and dismantle the fossil fuel economy, hold accountable those who profit off corporate greed, and build a world that puts a livable planet and public interest first. Check out @350Africa as they share the stories of brave activists and local leaders who are refusing to remain silent. #NoOilinVirunga 

The launch of Fossil Free Virunga short film coincided with the Democratic Republic of Congo’s Independence Day and offered an opportunity to celebrate the brave activists and local leaders who are refusing to remain silent while one of the most biologically diverse areas on earth is plundered and destroyed. We continue to stand in solidarity with you!

Learn more about the Fossil Free Virunga short film and how you can take action to support the campaign: https://afrikavuka.org/virunga/ 

#africa #climatejustice #landback

node.text:
Repost from @amazonwatch @xr_uganda @forestrebellion 

A congressional commission in Brazil passed Bill 490 last week – threatening to reverse decades of Indigenous territorial demarcation and stop the process of demarcating Indigenous lands altogether. While peacefully protesting the bill, Indigenous peoples were shot with rubber bullets and teargassed. 

Indigenous Brazilians are calling on YOUR solidarity! How can you support them? 

1️⃣ Go to the link in our bio and sign the petition calling on U.S. Climate Envoy John Kerry (@climateczar) and the Biden Administration to speak out publically for Indigenous Brazilians and against this bill.

2️⃣ Follow @apiboficial to get informed and donate to their cause! Donate link in our bio. 

#MarcoTemporalNão #PL490Não #TerraIndigenaFica #Brazil #AmazonRainforest #IndigenousRights #Indigenous #HumanRights #ClimateJustice

node.title: STAND WITH BRAZIL’s INDIGENOUS PEOPLES - LINK IN BIO

node.text:
URGENT! Bolsonaro has placed allies of agribusiness in FUNAI (Indigenous Affairs Agency), and now the survival of uncontacted tribes is at risk.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Why? Because Emergency Land Protection Orders currently shielding the forests of three uncontacted tribes are due to expire this year – FUNAI MUST renew them to prevent catastrophic invasion of their territories.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
We need to let FUNAI know the world is watching – and ready to defend the rights of #UncontactedTribes.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
✊ Share using #AssinaFUNAI
✍️ Email: svlint.org/LPOemail (link in Survival's bio)

node.title: Uncontacted Tribes and Land Protection Orders - the hidden story

node.text:
The uncontacted Ãwa of the 'Papaya Forest' on Brazil's Bananal Island are surrounded by danger.

When their lands are stolen & invaded, uncontacted tribes fight for their survival - or whole peoples could be wiped out.

In this video, Kamutaja Ãwa, a relative of the uncontacted Ãwa, outlines the tragedy of disease & violence that followed forced contact with her family, and asks for the rights of her uncontacted relatives to be respected.

#UncontactedTribesWeek #TribalVoice #UncontactedTribes

node.title: "We cannot let the colonizers get rid of us"

node.text:
🎤PASS THE MIC🎤

Este sábado arrancamos la Rebelión Global #G7 enfrente de la embajada de Canada con un waltz! 💃🏻🕺🏻

En este waltz mostramos la situación de las mineras canadienses en México. Para visibilizar la hipocresía del gobierno de Canada, rumbo a la reunion de líderes del G7 que tendrá lugar en el Reino Unido del 11 al 13 de Junio.

🇲🇽 Un ejemplo importante del saqueo está en la minería: son las compañías mineras canadienses (en oro Goldcorp, Torex Gold, Equinox Gold, Alamos Gold, y Agnico Eagle Mines, y en plata estan Pan American Silver, y Fortuna Silver, entre otras), las cuales en los últimos 15 años han acaparado del 65% al 75% de la inversión extranjera en la minería. De las 10 minas de oro mas grandes de México, 6 son de mineras canadienses. México es por mucho el país con más extracción de plata en el mundo, y uno de los mayores en otros metales como el oro, cobre.

💰Y solo le pagan al gobierno mexicano menos del 1% en impuestos! Goldcorp (con sede en Vancouver), en Sonora pagó 0.04% en impuestos, 3000 veces menos que en Canada. Lo que NO es suficiente para cubrir el daño al medio ambiente, asi como la explotación humana y de recursos naturales. De las mas de 25 mil concesiones mineras en México, solo se hacen 200 visitas al año por parte de las autoridades.

😤Mas de 40 pueblos originarios han sufrido ocupación minera, y cuando protestan los asesinan. A los trabajadores mineros se les paga 8 veces menos que a los canadienses, y la mitad no tienen seguro medico.

💦La minería en México usa 400 millones de metros cúbicos de agua, y en muchos casos en zonas con estrés hídrico ya existente. Aparte de que son contaminados con metales pesados.

Este waltz de la muerte a dejado a las empresas canadienses ricas y al medio ambiente mexicano destruido.

#G7 #SuCodiciaNuestraMuerte #YourGreedourDeath
.

node.text:
🎤 Pass The Mic: Global Rebellion 🎤

¡¡Hoy en el Día del Medio Ambiente arrancamos la Rebelión Global #G7 con el Sonidero Rebelde!! 💃🏻🕺🏻

@xr_youth_mx, @xrchihuahua, @xr_toluca, @xr_mex,  y  @xr_pachuca estamos bailando, pero también estamos recordando la avaricia e hipocresía de los gobiernos y empresas de los países del G7, que lo que no pueden destruir en sus países vienen a destruir a los nuestros, quieren comprar y vender todo, como si la vida tuviese precio.

🗓La reunión de líderes del G7 tendrá lugar en el Reino Unido del 11 al 13 de Junio

😤 Estos países suelen celebrar que en 2015 firmaron el histórico Acuerdo Climático de París para limitar las emisiones globales. Pero la realidad es que ninguna de las naciones del G7 está cumpliendo las promesas que hicieron. 🌎⌛️

💰 Mientras tanto sus empresas vienen a México con promesas de generar prosperidad en el país a través de sus inversiones. Pero la realidad es que están saqueando nuestros recursos, y dejandonos un territorio esteril y contaminado. 

⛏Un ejemplo importante del saqueo y contaminación son las mineras canadienses. 

⛽️Dada la crisis climática, es urgente hacer cambios profundos en nuestra sociedad, economía y gobierno. Ya NO podemos seguir extrayendo petróleo!! Pero las empresas petroleras del G7, siguen impunes destruyendo el planeta. En México tenemos empresas de Estados Unidos, Italia, Reino Unido, Alemania, y Francia. Todas ellas acercándonos cada vez más al punto de no retorno y colapso ambiental. 🌎⌛️

🚗 La gran industria automotriz en México (No. 6 global en 2018) también es muy contaminante, no solo en producción sino también en el uso de los automóviles mismos.  Aquí también empresas del G7 sobresalen, por ejemplo de Alemania, Japón,  Estados Unidos. No podemos seguir produciendo automóviles, y menos de combustión interna. 

Los países del G7 NO están haciendo lo suficiente para limitar el calentamiento global. Por eso les decimos que #LxsEstamosMirando, necesitamos que #HonrenSusDeudasMedioambientales, #ProtejanNuestrxsDefensoresDeLaTierra, porque sus empresas nos están matando y por eso les decimos #DejenDeMatarnos, #SuCodiciaNuestraMuerte.

node.text:
🚨PENGA ELLER LIVET?🚨

ARE YOU READY FOR THE NORDIC REBELLION?

Bli med Extinction Rebellion og vanlige folk fra hele Norden på en historisk stor sivil ulydighetsaksjon i Oslo 21.-29. august! Norge må ta et valg: Skal vi fortsette å velge penger, utbygging, industri og olje hver gang det kommer i konflikt med liv og natur? Eller skifte kurs før det er for sent?

XR fremmer to hovedkrav i aksjonsuka: “La olja ligge” og “liv foran vekst”. Olje og gass er Norges største synd. Våre nordiske venner kommer for å be oss slutte å rasere verden for oljepenger, før det er for sent. Extinction Rebellion forlanger rask utfasing av produksjon på norsk sokkel - og umiddelbar letestans.

I tillegg setter XR økonomisk vekst på dagsorden. Skal vi fortsette å rasere natur og klima for penger? Gjennom aksjoner, gatekunst og festivaler viser vi hva dette betyr. Enten det gjelder gruvedeponi i fjorden, motorveier, ny rullebane, oljefelt, hyttefelt, lakseoppdrett, rasering av matjord, skog eller dyrevelferd: Regjeringen må sette liv foran økonomisk vekst.

------

Vi bruker sivil ulydighet i våre aksjoner. Det er fordi vi mener det er nødvendig for å få til rask endring. Det har vist seg å fungere før, og vil fungere igjen om vi er mange nok. Ditt mot er nødvendig for å endre vårt giftige system! 

Vil du bli arrestert? Registrer deg her:

https://actionnetwork.org/forms/i-pledge-to-be-arrested-in-oslo?source=direct_link

MEN: Du trenger ikke bli arrestert, vi har behov for å dekke mange andre roller. Registrer deg her og velg hva du vil bidra med:

https://actionnetwork.org/forms/nordic-rebellion

@xrnorway 

Velkommen til opprør!

#nordiskopprør #extinctionrebellion #nordicrebellion #xroslo #climaterebellion #tellthetruth #leaveitintheground #equinor #rebelforlife #oslo #rebellion

node.text:
⛽️ NATIONAL FUEL BLOCKADE ⛽️⁣
⁣
@Chevron, you are greedy, genocidal, and ecocidal. Your business model = MURDER. The Extinction Rebellion has a message for you:⁣
⁣
KEEP IT IN THE GROUND!⁣ ⛽️ 
JUST TRANSITION FOR YOUR WORKERS NOW! ⛽️
⁣
Your extractivist greed will cook our kids and rob them of a habitable planet. ⁣
⁣
For this we will not relent. We will not forgive. We will escalate. 
⁣
💀⛽️🛢⛽️💀⁣
⁣
8am: @xr_bris_meanjin rebels blockaded the dirty, dirty @Chevron Fuel Terminal in Meanjin (Brisbane).⁣
⁣
As Oilies grieved and bore witness, Climate Emergency workers turned up on site in solidarity with fuel depot workers to demand A JUST TRANSITION FOR FUEL DEPOT WORKERS NOW!⁣
⁣
🛢⛽️🚚⛽️🛢⁣
⁣
“The writing’s on the wall. These industries will not survive into the future,” says Kate, paediatric nurse and extinction rebel.⁣
⁣
“The workers here may not think we are here to support them, but we are. We demand a just transition for workers into sustainable jobs. We’re here to challenge the corporations profiting from unchecked environmental destruction.”⁣
⁣
“Action must happen now across all levels at @Chevron; their supply chains and networks. Climate action must be key to every decision and climate justice assured.”⁣
⁣
🛢⛽️🚚⛽️🛢⁣
⁣
This action is took place on stolen Turrbal land.⁣
⁣
We pay respect to Elders past and present. We acknowledge their sovereignty and ongoing resistance against the destructive forces of capitalism and colonialism which fuel the climate and ecological emergency.⁣

@xrebellionaus @xr_bris_meanjin 
⁣
#NationalFuelBlockade #ClimateCodeRed #JustTransitionNow #ClimateEmergency #ClimateCrisis #ClimateJustice #TellTheTruth #ActNow #CitizensAssembly #RebelForLife #SystemChangeNotClimateChange #StateCapture #ExtinctionRebellion #ExtinctionRebellionAustralia #DutyOfCare ⁣

node.text:
PASS THE MIC | TOGETHER IN CRISIS 

XR Université de Goma!

Alongside our amplifying of XR Vaal and XR Makassar XR Sheffield’s Justice group have formed a partnership with XR Université de Goma. 

This groups is based in the Democratic Republic of the Congo very close to Virunga National Park and have asked us to help them with some crowdfunding to support them. There bold plans focus around fighting at all costs against oil exploitation in Virunga National Park, a world heritage site with one of the planet’s last surviving populations of mountain gorillas. 

This passionate group of ecologist’s actions so far have included educating in schools and communities, creative and peaceful actions around water preservation and against fossil fuel exploitation.

Stay tuned to hear more about the crowdfunder and a Q and A event with the group, but in the mean time here are some photos of their actions!

FOLLOW @xrsheff @xr_universite_de_goma for more!

#passthemic #togetherincrisis

node.text:
GLOBAL ACTIONS AGAINST FRACKING AS MOVEMENTS AROUND THE WORLD UNITE

Rebellions in Mendoza, Argentina where fracking is having disastrous impacts on water and a solidarity action in Ireland. Climate activists tried to shut down gas terminals and protested fracking plans in several countries on July 30, as a post-lockdown push to influence the agenda ahead of November's COP26 climate summit in Scotland kicks off in earnest.

Up to 3,000 activists from Germany's Ende Gelaende, a green civil disobedience movement, blocked the Brunsbuttel liquefied natural gas terminal in a bid to stop operations. Campaigners also took to the streets in a dozen countries including Argentina, Ireland, Bolivia and Canada.

In a strategic shift, they are targeting gas rather than coal plants, and linking actions in the Global North and South. Their target is European multinationals that are doing abroad what they cannot do at home - namely fracking. The action also intends to create space for the climate movement in Scotland to regroup and rebuild momentum in the run-up to COP26. 

#WorldAgainstFracking #EndLNG #ShaleMustFall #EndeGelaende #Fracking #GlobalBanOnFracking #NotHereNotAnywhere #EndFrackingEcocide #StopGNL #ColombiaLibreDeFracking #ExtinctionRebellion #ClimateChange #ThisIsAnEmergency #ActNow

node.text:
AUGUST RISE UP 

Wunderbar bunte und kreative Impressionen erreichen uns vom #Uprising-Festival dieses Wochenende, mit dem der morgen startende #AugustRiseUp in Berlin eingeleitet wird! 
An zwei Tagen wurden dort Vorträge gehalten, Trainings gegeben, Reden gehalten, Musik performt, Textilien bedruckt, Kipppunkte-Jenga gespielt und vieles mehr.

Und am Bahnhof Wannsee haben sich heute hunderte Menschen mit Rädern getroffen, um über die AVUS nach Berlin zu fahren. 

Am Bundesverkehrsministerium wurde sich mit den vier Fingern des @adfc_berlin zu einer großen Kundgebung getroffen, dann ging es weiter zum Festival des @augustriseup!

Bei all dem waren wir natürlich auch dabei und sind voller Vorfreude auf die kommende Woche. Bist du dabei? 🤞

Repost: @extinctionrebelliondeutschland 
#AugustRiseUp #RiseUp #Berlin #ExtinctionRebellion
